head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MELTZER, JULIE W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MELTZER, JULIE W.

block.p: MELTZER--Julie W. on December 30, 2006. Beloved wife of the late George. Loving mother of Laurie Meltzer, Donna Meltzer, MD, Cathy Alexander and Shelley Egnor. Dear mother-in-law of Michael Egnor, MD. Cherished grandmother of Daniel, Julie, Emily, Scott and Justin. As a Captain in the US Army Nurse Corps, Julie served with the Ninth Evacuation Hospital (Roosevelt Unit) in Europe and North Africa during WW II. We will love, cherish and miss you always.
